info.title: seamless-api
info.description: General API for the seamless frontend.

schema.title: Response List Roles Admin Roles Get

get.description: Return counts for core models to give an overview of the data in the DB.

delete.summary: Delete all objects in R2 bucket
delete.description:
ADMIN: Delete all objects in the configured R2 bucket.

This operation is irreversible. Only users passing `_ensure_admin` may call it.
Objects are deleted in batches using the S3-compatible API exposed by R2.

get.description: List objects in the R2 bucket, optionally filtered by prefix.

schema.title: Response List Objects Admin R2 Objects Get

post.description:
Login using a Firebase ID token. Ensures local user exists and returns token/user data.

Parameters:
    request (Request): The incoming HTTP request containing the Firebase access token in JSON body.
    db (AsyncSession): The database session dependency.
Returns:
    TokenSchema: The access token and user data.
Raises:
    HTTPException: If token verification or user retrieval/creation fails.

get.description: Return organizations for the current user

schema.title: Response Get Organizations Account Organization Get

get.description: Return teams for the current user's team

schema.title: Response Get Team Account Team Get

post.description: Create a new team and link it to the current user.
Invite a new member by creating a pending user linked to the same team and sending an invite (placeholder for email).
Accept an invite. This is a placeholder that would verify an invite token and activate the account.

patch.description: Update team details such as name and description.
Change role of a team member (placeholder field on User).

delete.description: Remove a member from the team.

schema.title: Response List Roles Account Roles Get

get.description: Return paginated list of events for the user's team.

post.description: Create a new event for the user's team.
Create a form configuration for an event.

get.description:
Get form configuration for a given event. If form_type is provided, filter by form type.

Otherwise return first form config.

Step 1: Generate the URL to send the user to Google or Microsoft.
We pass the Firebase UID in the 'state' parameter to identify the user on return.

Step 2: The provider redirects here with a 'code'.
We exchange that code for an access_token and refresh_token.

delete.description: Remove an integration for the current user by provider.

get.description: Check if the current user has a Google Drive integration.

post.description: Create a new folder in the user's Google Drive.

Accepts a multipart file upload and streams it to the configured R2 bucket.
Returns a `public_url` which points to /uploads/proxy/{key} (the proxy route you already have).

parameters.name: key

schema.description: Object key in the bucket, e.g. users/123/img.png
schema.title: Key

parameters.description: Object key in the bucket, e.g. users/123/img.png

post.description: Create a promo configuration for an event.

get.description:
Get promo configuration for a given event. If promo_type is provided, filter by promo type.

Otherwise return first promo config.

integrationId.title: Integrationid
integrationId.description: The internal UUID of the linked integration (e.g. Google Drive) for this event, if applicable.

OrganizationCreateSchema.description: Schema for creating a new organization.
